div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1139 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1905 Burial: c. 90 B.C. Contents: 1 AR, 5 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: 1 hemidr. (as Zograph, pl. 43, 12) 5 AE (as BMC 39) Disposition: museum material lost during war Shkorpil, IAK 30 (1909), p. 12, no. 38
